front.title: DetNet Data Plane: MPLS over IEEE 802.1 Time-Sensitive Networking (TSN)

abstract.t: This document specifies the Deterministic Networking MPLS data plane when operating over an IEEE 802.1 Time-Sensitive Networking (TSN) sub-network. This document does not define new procedures or processes. Whenever this document makes requirements statements or recommendations, these are taken from normative text in the referenced RFCs.
